name: Fruit Match 3 - Jewel Crush
description:
"Fruit Match 3 - Jewel Crush" is the most exciting Match-3 game. Cool graphics and effects with simple game play.

=== How To Play ===

Different kinds of fruits are falling from the top of the screen. Join three or more of the same fruits vertically or diagonally to vaporize them. Create enough matches to complete the level before time runs out.

Click on special items to activate power-ups.

=== Features ===

- 3 modes, Easy, Medium, and Hard.
- 30 challenge levels
- Cool graphics
- Leaderboards to show your best scores

What are you waiting for? Download now to experience the best Match-3 game!!!
